Write as Rain

Write as Rain

is an intelligent weather app that draws the current weather based on data returned from the
Weatherbit.io API.
The animations are powered by the
p5.js library,
and the site was built with
JavaScript, SCSS, and HTML.

To use this application, enter a U.S. 5 digit or 9 digit zipcode with hyphen. Ex: 10011 or 10011-7902
Created by Christine Adams
